TopicTitle: KSP bug report and proof that "Not looking at the error message" dosen't work.

Articles.Content: So It was a regular day, and It was very happy! I had just finished launching my "Euclid" rocket boosted suborbital space plane. I had landed the capsule and was about to recover it when I noticed I couldn't scroll between options in the option menu, I turned on cursor, and it fixed that problem, but I couldn't select any. And so I said "Hmmm, That's strange.." and so I tried going out of the Esc menu, and I couldn't select any there either. And so I said "I just have to close it. And I did, and it fixed. But also I heard this guy say (I forget who this was) "The 100% PS4 save fix is to when you get the crash report, close it before it gets to the error message." And so guess what? It didn't work! (Sorry I'm speaking like this Squad, I had a very bad day at school missed a field trip etc.)
